snippet: A personal landmark for New Yorkers who proposed there, or dreamed of putting on their finest and dancing away the night there, is now a city landmark too.
abstract: A personal landmark for New Yorkers who proposed there, or dreamed of putting on their finest and dancing away the night there, is now a city landmark too.
lead_paragraph: It’s official: The Rainbow Room, a personal landmark for New Yorkers who proposed there or dreamed of putting on their finest and dancing away the night there, is now a city landmark too. Read more on City Room »

headline.main: Rainbow Room Is Given Landmark Status
